g.text: into a folder on the customers machine.
Tiger test environment manager starts all
Tiger proxies (reverse, aggregating, local) will be started.
part of the github repo will be started
The Primärsystem sends requests to the Konnektoren
via the local reverse Tiger proxies.
It follows either manually by human tester or
via test scripts the test work flow
The test work flow has been completed or aborted
all relevant data, the TITUS platform needs
to perfomr the next steps in the certification process
The ZIP archive is uploaded manually
The local test report contains detailed failure logs
